short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show pictures for all entries in the news feed on GitHub's dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows you pictures for all entries in the news feed on GitHub's dashboard, not only pull requests and issues.

Pro Tip: The extension icon is also a shortcut to GitHub :P
